ygData.msgSnippet: OK what game are you looking to do, your message was not clear on what game you are trying to get non addicted to. hehehe  GOOD LUCK. Seriously I play both and
ygData.messageBody:
OK what game are you looking to do, your message was
not clear on what game you are trying to get non
addicted to. hehehe GOOD LUCK.

Seriously I play both and depending on what server, I
always welcome company

Send me a line


--- soulfire18_01 <soulfire18_01@...> wrote:
> Well gee didnt i get in to the wrong grp i thought

> players not SWG players im lookin for real
> crackheads that can play
> the game without making some kind of addiction out
> of it, i like the
> game but its not taking over my life.
>
> Qanaesin Truehearted
> Cleric of the 52th season
> Vallon Zek
